page.description: Covers four javascript methods that were introduced in version 11: A5.u.getUniqueId(), A5.u.element.show(), A5.u.element.hide(), A5.u.element.toggle(,)

section.title: A5.u.getUniqueId();
section.description: Returns a unique ID - for if you are creating an element on the fly and need an ID that will be unique

section.title: A5.u.element.hide(<element>,<animationSettings>);
section.description: Show and hide an element with animation. Will fall back gracefully to plain show and hide if jQuery isn't available.

case.description: The element to show or hide
A JSON object of animation settings

section.example: { type: '', // animation type - ['none','fade','slide','blind','clip','drop','explode','fold','puff','scale','size','pulsate'] duration: 1000, // duration in milliseconds onComplete: function(){{ // function to call on complete {

section.title: A5.u.element.toggle(<element>,<animationSettings>);
section.description: Toggle between show and hide depending on the current state.

case.description: The element to show or hide
A JSON object of animation settings.
